content: description whether you are off to the beach or hitting up the market this tote is perfect for both the rewind yarn makes it nice and sturdy so you can fill it up it has a fun stripe design with cute embellished details it s worked from the bottom up in the round this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is a kit with lionbrand 2 it comes with all the yarn you need to make your tote + the pdf digital download of the pattern you can even customize your yarn color this pattern is available as a full video tutorial 3 on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-lucy-tote-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3fi88 3 https //youtu be/xj0qdxild7a
